message: Hello Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $10000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8000 for the product. I believe it's a bit steep at $10000. Can you consider my counteroffer?
